articles.description: Third seed Carlos Alcaraz suffers a seismic second-round exit at the US Open with a thumping defeat by unseeded Dutchman Botic van de Zandschulp.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz stunned by Botic van de Zandschulp in US Open upset

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Servette vs Chelsea in the UEFA Conference League
articles.title: Servette vs Chelsea: UEFA Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Poppy Maskill and Tully Kearney both win gold as Paralympics GB claim six medals on the opening day of action at the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: GB win two golds among six medals on day one in Paris

articles.description: Two-time champion Naomi Osaka says it feels like "my heart dies every time I lose" after her second-round defeat by Karolina Muchova at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Naomi Osaka feels her 'heart dies' every time she loses after Karolina Muchova defeat

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats followed by match report from Hearts vs Viktoria Plzen in the Europa League.
articles.title: Hearts vs Viktoria Plzen: Europa League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Once unsure of his place in the Bazball era, Joe Root has found his best form by playing like Joe Root, writes Stephan Shemilt
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Joe Root finds his best in Bazball era

articles.description: Top seed Iga Swiatek breezes into the third round of the US Open, while former Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina withdraws.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Iga Swiatek sails into third round; Elena Rybakina withdraws

articles.description: British number one Katie Boulter is knocked out of the US Open second round in a a straight-sets defeat by Spain's Jessica Bouzas Maneiro.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Katie Boulter stunned by Jessica Bouzas Maneiro in second round

articles.description: England stand-in captain Ollie Pope is "not the kind of personality" who should be leading the team, says Michael Vaughan.
articles.title: Ollie Pope 'not an England captain', says Michael Vaughan

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the draw in the new-look Champions League opening phase and the competition's new format.
articles.title: Champions League Draw: Liverpool play holders Real Madrid, Man City face PSG in league phase
